CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: PFDTBT showed a maximum PCE of 2.2% , and PFDTBT derivatives containing branched alkyl chains ( BisDMO - PFDTBT ) showed higher PCEs.

Let's think step by step.

1. PFDTBT - This is the first material name mentioned in the paragraph. It is a type of organic semiconductor material that is used in organic photovoltaic cells.
2. BisDMO-PFDTBT - This is the second material name mentioned in the paragraph. It is a derivative of PFDTBT that contains branched alkyl chains, which results in higher power conversion efficiencies (PCEs) compared to PFDTBT.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: PFDTBT showed a maximum PCE of 2.2% , and PFDTBT derivatives containing branched alkyl chains ( BisDMO - PFDTBT ) showed higher PCEs.

Let's think step by step.

1. PFDTBT - This is the first "Property Name" entity in the paragraph. It is mentioned as having a maximum PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) of 2.2%.
2. PCE - This is the second "Property Name" entity in the paragraph. It is a property of PFDTBT and its derivatives, and it stands for Power Conversion Efficiency.
3. BisDMO-PFDTBT - This is the third "Property Name" entity in the paragraph. It is a derivative of PFDTBT that contains branched alkyl chains, and it showed higher PCEs than PFDTBT.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. PCE - This is a material property that stands for Power Conversion Efficiency.
2. PFDTBT - This is a material that has a maximum PCE of 2.2%.
3. BisDMO-PFDTBT - This is a material that is a derivative of PFDTBT and has higher PCEs than PFDTBT.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: PFDTBT showed a maximum PCE of 2.2% , and PFDTBT derivatives containing branched alkyl chains ( BisDMO - PFDTBT ) showed higher PCEs.

Let's think step by step.

1. PFDTBT - This is the first mentioned "Property Value" entity in the paragraph. It is mentioned in the context of its maximum PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) of 2.2%.
2. 2.2% - This is the second mentioned "Property Value" entity in the paragraph. It is the maximum PCE of PFDTBT.
3. Higher PCEs - This is the third mentioned "Property Value" entity in the paragraph. It refers to the higher power conversion efficiencies of PFDTBT derivatives containing branched alkyl chains.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
